property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Counterattack Light 3:: When a creature attacks you, if you haven't used 'Counterattack' during that attack, you may cast this spell from your hand for no cost. If you do, pay Light 3: at the start of your next turn. If you can't pay, you lose the game. ■ Draw a card, then you may put a Light creature that costs 3 or less from your hand. That creature gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {HYPER ENERGY} (As you summon this creature, you may tap any number of your creatures that have different costs. For each creature you tapped in this way, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may draw 2 cards. ■ Your opponent's creatures can't attack during the turn they are put. ■ Your opponent's creatures don't untap except at the start of their turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Counterattack Water 2:: When a creature attacks you, if you haven't used 'Counterattack' during that attack, you may cast this spell from your hand for no cost. If you do, pay Water 2: at the start of your next turn. If you can't pay, you lose the game. ■ Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. They can't attack or block until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {HYPER ENERGY} (As you summon this creature, you may tap any number of your creatures that have different costs. For each creature you tapped in this way, this creature costs 2 less to summon. If you do, draw 2 cards. ■ Whenever one of your creatures is destroyed, each opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Counterattack Darkness 3:: When a creature attacks you, if you haven't used 'Counterattack' during that attack, you may cast this spell from your hand for no cost. If you do, pay Darkness 3: at the start of your next turn. If you can't pay, you lose the game. ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature loses infinite power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has 0 power or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {YOBINION} (When you summon this creature, you may reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a creature that costs less than this one. Put that creature. Shuffle the rest and put them on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Counterattack Fire 2:: When a creature attacks you, if you haven't used 'Counterattack' during that attack, you may cast this spell from your hand for no cost. If you do, pay Fire 2: at the start of your next turn. If you can't pay, you lose the game. ■ Choose 2 creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Sympathy: Cards in your mana zone (This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your cards in your mana zone. It can't cost less than 1.) {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Counterattack Nature 4:: When a creature attacks you, if you haven't used 'Counterattack' during that attack, you may cast this spell from your hand for no cost. If you do, pay Nature 4: at the start of your next turn. If you can't pay, you lose the game. ■ Put a nature creature that costs 5 or less from your mana zone tapped. Until the start of your next turn, whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, they attack that creature if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, choose up to 3 of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent shieldifies one of them, puts one into their mana zone and returns one to it's owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't attack. ■ During your opponent's turn, when your opponent would put a creature that costs more than the number of cards in their mana zone, if you have a total of 3 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, your opponent puts that creature on the bottom of their deck instead, then put this creature on the bottom of your deck.
